ddf.catalog.source

Interface FederatedSource

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Describable, RemoteSource, ResourceReader, Source
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CatalogStore, RegistryStore
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCswSource, AbstractCswStore, ConfluenceSource, CswSourceImpl, OpenSearchSource, RegistryStoreImpl, TwitterSource, WfsSource, WfsSource

    public interface FederatedSource
extends RemoteSource
    Provides an implementation of Source that represents a remote that can be optionally included in federated Query implementations.
    See Also:
    Source, Query

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface ddf.catalog.source.Source

        getContentTypes, getSecurityAttributes, isAvailable, isAvailable, query

      • Methods inherited from interface ddf.catalog.resource.ResourceReader

        getOptions, getSupportedSchemes, retrieveResource

      • Methods inherited from interface ddf.catalog.util.Describable

        getDescription, getId, getOrganization, getTitle, getVersion
